divs: Sighting DetailsMy family was camping at Berlin Lake in mahoning Co. in Ohio (husband, me 3kids)over labor day weekend!! We rode to the playground around 6:00 pm Sundayevening. The sky was clear and cloudless. I told my husband it was his turn torun after kids and i went and sat by our bikes. The playground was full of kidsand adults
trends: there have been no other sightings in berlin \ canfeild
This sighting has never been favorited.
